headline.main: Back to 'Oasis' Earth

results.snippet: Once again, happily, a captive of earth's gravity, Apollo 8 is speeding back to this planet with its tired but triumphant crew, participants in the greatest adventure in human history. The first men ever to journey to the neighborhood of the terribly...
results.lead_paragraph: Once again, happily, a captive of earth's gravity, Apollo 8 is speeding back to this planet with its tired but triumphant crew, participants in the greatest adventure in human history. The first men ever to journey to the neighborhood of the terribly bleak and lonely expanse of the moon, they are understandably eager to return to what astronaut James Lovell called the "grand oasis in the great vastness of space," this green and flowering earth.
